query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'oracle_messages' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'content';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 26oPSLF1JrHBkC1.root --database GS77b3TFJGdjuXRCHKnBPH --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'oracle_messages' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'content';
